reviews.review_msg: Andy was a great professor, I took classes with him many years ago and I have been very successful in my career. He gave me very good advice and encouragement. He sees beyond the confines of rhetoric and can point you where you need to go. He is the best professor I had at SFU. He was a catalyst in my education and career, very grateful!

Awesome Prof, makes you write your papers where you have to think and actually apply your own knowledge.  His grading is fair. Gives lots of feedback on your papers and also what he expects.  For those that complain about the grading percents go to a University in the States that is like how they all are.
if you enjoy paying $600 to learn absolute nothing and being bored out of your mine then take his class
